page.title: 15Gateway Supermarket: Yeovil.
page.content: In Gateways they have got a restroom. They said that;"The most popular food is baked beans".They do not bring the trolleys in at night but, 12 got stolen in a week.{The average takings {in a day is Â£35,000.}The workers get Â£50 a week. The people do enjoy their employment. They get complaints from time to time. It opened 11 years ago. They do get a lot of shoplifters. The first manager was Mr M.Heart. But the one now is Mr Bent . They have got 4 people for first aid. There are 26 people who work on the tiles.{They {open at 8:30am and close at 8:00pm. Here are some of the things they sell, Bread, milk, cheese, meat, sweets, tissues, crisps, beer, wine, tea, coffee, books, mugs, cakes, pies, sausages, chicken, ice_cream, spice, peanut butter, soup, tights.
